statements: SELECT * FROM game_statistics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, total_score FROM game_statistics WHERE level > 3;
SELECT player_id, game_name, total_score, level FROM game_statistics WHERE playtime_minutes < 60;
SELECT game_name, level, playtime_minutes FROM game_statistics WHERE total_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM game_statistics ORDER BY total_score DESC, playtime_minutes ASC;
SELECT player_id, total_score, level FROM game_statistics WHERE game_name = 'Example Game' ORDER BY total_score DESC, level ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT game_name, AVG(total_score) AS avg_score, MAX(playtime_minutes) AS max_playtime FROM game_statistics GROUP BY game_name HAVING AVG(total_score) > 50 ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT player_id, total_score, playtime_minutes FROM game_statistics WHERE total_score > 100 AND level BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY playtime_minutes DESC, total_score ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, game_name, total_score, level, playtime_minutes FROM game_statistics WHERE total_score < 50 OR game_name LIKE '%Adventure%' ORDER BY player_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, SUM(total_score) AS total_score_sum, AVG(playtime_minutes) AS avg_playtime FROM game_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_score_sum > 500 ORDER BY total_score_sum DESC
SELECT * FROM game_statistics;
SELECT player_id, score FROM game_statistics WHERE level > 5;
SELECT game_id, level FROM game_statistics ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, challenges_completed FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, challenges_completed, trophies FROM player_progress WHERE trophies > 10 ORDER BY challenges_completed ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_statistics WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY score DESC, player_id ASC;
SELECT game_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_statistics GROUP BY game_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM game_statistics GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ps.player_id, ps.challenges_completed, pp.trophies FROM player_progress pp JOIN game_statistics gs ON pp.player_id = gs.player_id WHERE gs.level = 10;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM game_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_statistics;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM game_statistics ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_games_played FROM player_progress WHERE total_games_played > 50;
SELECT player_id, recommended_game_id, recommendation_reason FROM recommendations ORDER BY player_id, recommended_game_id;
SELECT player_id, game_id, level FROM game_statistics WHERE score > 100 AND level >= 3;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score, level FROM game_statistics WHERE player_id = 12345 ORDER BY score DESC, level ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE total_games_played > 100 AND highest_level_reached >= 20 ORDER BY total_time_played DESC;

SELECT rs.player_id, rs.recommended_game_id, rs.recommendation_reason, ps.total_games_played FROM recommendations rs INNER JOIN player_progress ps ON rs.player_id = ps.player_id WHERE ps.total_games_played BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY ps.total_games_played ASC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, level FROM game_statistics WHERE level > 5 OR score < 50 ORDER BY level DESC, game_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, total_games_played, highest_level_reached FROM player_progress WHERE total_games_played < 50 OR highest_level_reached < 10 ORDER BY player_id ASC, total_games_played DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM Players ORDER BY experience DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Games WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM Games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, game_title, recommendation_text FROM Players JOIN Recommendations ON Players.player_id = Recommendations.player_id ORDER BY Players.player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, level, genre FROM Players p JOIN Games g ON p.level = g.game_id WHERE p.level > 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC, genre DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM Players WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, genre FROM Players, Games WHERE Players.level >= 5 AND Players.player_id = Games.game_id
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress INNER JOIN Players ON PlayerProgress.player_id = Players.player_id AND PlayerProgress.level_progress > 50 AND Players.player_name = 'John'
SELECT game_title, genre, release_date FROM Games WHERE genre = 'RPG' AND release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT player_name, recommendation_text FROM Players JOIN Recommendations ON Players.player_id = Recommendations.player_id ORDER BY player_name
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_year FROM games ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_score >= 1000 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_category, release_year FROM games WHERE game_category = 'Action' ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, current_level FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE current_level >= 10 AND player_name LIKE 'Jo%';
SELECT player_name, challenge_name, challenge_description FROM players JOIN challenges ON players.player_id = challenges.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice' OR challenge_name = 'Survival';
SELECT player_name, recommendation_text FROM players JOIN recommendations ON players.player_id = recommendations.player_id ORDER BY player_name, recommendation_text;
